title: nenarunchi brOva (varaNam)
sahitya:
nenarunci brOva nIvE dikkugada rAma

anupallavi

 vinara shrI rAmacandrapura vilAsa vAsa bhakatAdhAra

ciTTasvara sAhitya

nAdu vinnapambulu vinEdhoravu nIvEyani sadA madi dalaci nIdu 
pada sarOja sannidhi gAci sharaNa joccitini harE nanUra rakSincu

caraNam

 shrta mandAra shubhakara
